entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
